First of all, it's my first post in the forums so I'd like to say hi!

I want to make a kobold champion on arelith here is what I came up with, it's really feat starved so maybe picking up fighter would be better than black guard.

To clarify some points: There is a +6 Studded Leather armor that kobolds can use in arelith, the dext point is there in order to get +5 dex from cats grace and +2 dex from a crafted cloak that also gives daily improved invisibility in order to get maximum ac from the slot. 50 UMD is needed in order to equip a crafted race locked short sword (Dale short sword). 

Maximum AB: 22(Base)+15(STR)+5(GMW scrolls)+6(Taunt)+2(Bard song)+4(Feats, focus, epic focus, prowess)+2(Arelith -2hand command bonus)= 56
Maximum AC: 10(Base)+5(Expertise)+3(Armor)+4(Dexterity)+6(armor enchantment)+1(Boots dodge AC)+5(Shadowshield scroll)+6 (+4 large shield)+2(Armor skin)+1(mage armor dodge)+12(divine shield)+4(haste)+4(shield spell)+6(tumble)+4(RDD bonus)=73

Here is the thing, this build has really good saves and good AC and AB in mu opinion, but I'm wondering if I should drop BG and take fighter levels instead for feats like KD, IKD, improved critical, disarm etc. Since it already has a great STR bonus and a nice AB, IKD feels too good to skip. And would it be wise to drop divine might for KD? It's a great damage boost and kobolds are small creatures so is non improved KD worth taking?
